about_the_game:
Embark on the grand saga of the Empire of Brazil in "Pedro of Brazil". Join historical heroes like Dom Pedro II, Dom Pedro I, Princess Isabel, André Rebouças, and Maria Quitéria, and fight for honor, duty, and destiny.

Uncover hidden abilities deep within Brazilian history, facing challenges from the Independence to the battles of the Paraguayan War. Withstand external threats and ensure the security of the largest empire in the Americas.

From Quasares Game Studio, this next-generation Action-Adventure brings to life the vibrant events of the Brazilian Empire.

Choose from various historical characters and navigate through conflicts, betrayals, and alliances on your journey across Brazilian lands and beyond.

In a vast country, filled with challenges and opportunities, your path will be shaped by the decisions you make. As the empire grapples with revolutions, political intrigues, and supernatural forces, the fate of the nation rests in your hands.

Developed with the powerful "Unreal Engine 5", "Pedro of Brazil" delivers a storyline true to reality, curated with the expertise of renowned historians. The game offers unparalleled freedom to explore and interact in a world that responds to your choices. The captivating and cinematic narrative brings characters to life in a unique way, creating an immersive experience in the heart of imperial Brazil.

The Empire of Brazil, a land of diversity and wealth, conceals secrets and offers profound exploration that challenges the player at every turn, with maps true to historical cities.

The gameplay of "Pedro of Brazil" is not just about combat. Assist the Abolitionist Association and Princess Isabel in freeing the enslaved, fighting for abolition and the rights of the oppressed.

Historical Characters: Dive into the journeys of legendary figures, each with their unique characteristics, motivations, and visions. Recruit them to fight by your side or experience each of their personal journeys.

Dynamic Combat: Rely on authentic combat techniques from the era, emphasizing strategy and insight. Challenge yourself across different difficulty levels and feel the impact of every decision on the battlefield.

A Cinematic Journey: "Pedro of Brazil" is more than a game; it's an experience. Relive the nation's historical events with intensity and passion.

Quasares Game Studio invites you to this experience. Step into history and leave your mark in "Pedro of Brazil".

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Delve into the epic saga of the Brazilian Empire in "Pedro of Brazil". Master gunfights, swordplay, and hand-to-hand combat. Play as historic figures and immerse yourself in events like the Brazilian Independence and the Paraguayan War. Relive the glory and challenges of an era!
